zabella.excerpt: The 14th Zabella Zine is complete — an unconventional collaborative release. Its texts and illustrations were inspired by our new album titled MOLDVAI, which draws from traditional csángó melodies.
zabella.limitedOffer: We created a total of 150 hand-stitched MOLDVAI zines. Order your own unique copy today, and we'll include an exclusive download code that lets you listen to the full MOLDVAI album right now — well ahead of its official release.

aboutZabella.afterLink: is an independent, literary fanzine. Their issues feature different themes, with different artists' illustrations and guest poems. Their goal is to give opportunities to both beginning, experimental writers and illustrators.

zabella.captionEditors: The editors of the Zabella Zine are Domján Julcsi and Kisvarga Anika.
zabella.specialFeature: What makes this issue special is that the participating creators — a total of ten writers and five illustrators — each used a track from our MOLDVAI album as their starting point.

aboutShipping.postalService: The zine will be sent to you by post. Currently only available in Hungary.
aboutShipping.priceExplainer: The price of the zine includes the download code for the album is
